translations: 可能，或许；（用于强调惊讶或震惊）怎么，究竟；怎么可能，绝不可能（用于否定句，表强调）；能不能，能否（用于礼貌地请求）；尽量，尽可能

sentences.sentence: I can't possibly meet that deadline.
No I really can't possibly answer that!
sentences.translation: 不，我真地根本不可能回答那个问题。

sentences.sentence: They were casually dressed; possibly students.
sentences.translation: 他们穿着随意，可能是学生。
